description: Astilbe 'Deutschland' is an amazing plant species due to its distinctive features and beautiful foliage. It produces large mauve plumes of blossom during the summer months, adding a dazzling hint of colour to shaded areas. Its mounded, deep green foliage is evergreen in some areas, providing year-round interest, while its tall and graceful form adds an elegant air to any garden. Its tolerance of difficult soils and shady spots makes it an ideal choice for a low maintenance but stunning addition to a garden. Astilbe 'Deutschland' is a great choice for any gardener.
